channel.title: CIS(Computer Class), First day of the class
channel.description:
It started like an ordinary college course, had a lecture bit and bytes, different internets like internet2, speed internet, fiber optic cable etc... then we got to the socail networks, which leaded to gaming which leaded to an hour and a half discussion on World of Warcraft; which we all found out one of the instructors teaching the class plays it on the realm Fenris.
This goes to show you that World of Warcraft is used for not only gaming but educational purposes.
Just thought I'd share about my night tonight.

item.title: CIS(Computer Class), First day of the class
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:20, topic:457014”][quote author=t4 link=topic=559952.msg4090139#msg4090139 date=1346255079]

There is two instructors in the classrooms here. the guy who brought wow up is one who goes around helping people with questions while the other one usually lectures. I believe he might be s student in training

most likely a TA…
[/quote]

lol this isnt highschool seeing a TA in college doesnt happen,at least not here[/quote]What? That’s almost as common as having a professor. You see TA’s and interns both all the time. (Or at least in America)

Read full topic

item.title: CIS(Computer Class), First day of the class
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:457041”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=559952.msg4089834#msg4089834 date=1346215981]
Lol @ that topic.

@OP

Well sounds like he’s not a dedicated teacher, more a dedicated nerd.
[/quote]My psychology teacher was the same way. His way of teaching us about Freud was giving constant examples os sexual items… was sort of creepy/interesting both at the same time. (I know Freud was messed up but still… )[/quote]

Trying to convince anyone who listens that every young man deeply lusts to have sex with their mother? Then to kill their Father? Saying that all women are born sexually attracted to their mother? Did he happen to mention his views on these matters? I’d bet anything that your teacher condones this type of activity, lol.

Read full topic

item.description:

runescape sucks:

WoW is okay. I prefer runescape because you have more fun on f2p on RS than WoW. Just incase you don’t have P2P, I’ve never even tried WoW by paying for it so I really have no right to criticize.

True, I take the ball statement back ;P.

item.title: CIS(Computer Class), First day of the class
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:7, topic:457014”][quote author=t4 link=topic=559952.msg4089794#msg4089794 date=1346211467]
lots of people play games at any age. that sounds like a really lousy class, though.
[/quote]

Lousy class? I take it you’re just getting your post counts up? Just like any normal college class. Still in high school?[/quote]
my university classes, mind you i’m not a highschooler, aren’t about world of warcraft or different tiers of cables used for networking :P. my point was the course material didn’t sound challenging at all.

Read full topic
